body.name: ODK Computer Desk with Drawers, 48 Inch Office Desk with Storage & Shelves, Work Writing Desk with Monitor Stand Shelf, Black Home Office Desks for Small Spaces
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Thursday, February 22. Order within 18 hrs 29 mins
features: Design for Multi-Use: This multi-functional computer desk works as workstation as well as a decoration to your room. 48" x 19.7" surface provides ample space for writing, working and gaming. The height of the desk is 35.6 Inch, there’s plenty of legroom for rest. With a industrial style and modern design, the wooden desk can match a variety of decor styles.

Enrich Space: ODK office desk with drawers provide you plenty of under-desk storage room for books, working documents, office stuff. The open shelves keep everything in easy reach. 2 level adjustable shelf height allows different size computer host to put in.

Table with Monitor Stand Shelf: Measuring 6.7” in height, the monitor shelf raises your screen for better visibility and reduces neck and backache, large space for monitor stand allows two computer monitors.
Sturdy and Stable: This simple modern desk is made of thicker metal frame and sturdy wood board which are stable and durable. Adjustable table foot pads enhance stability without damaging the floor.

Easy to Assemble: To make assembly as effortless as possible, we make clear and detailed instructions, numbered parts. For any problem, please feel free to contact us, customer service team will response in 24 hours.
body.description: Computer Desk with Monitor Stand Home Office Desk This computer desk brings a modern style for home. Designed for small rooms or limited spaces, its strong storage power can keep everything organized without any mess. 2 drawers and 2-tier shelves design could help you place your favorite books, decorations, or notes for easy access, which fits well in your home office, study room, bedroom, or living room.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: ODK Computer Desk with Drawer and Shelves

Specifications: Color: Black Material: MDF board & Metal Product Size: 47.2"L*19.7"W*35.4"H Product Weight: 16kg Computer Desk with Monitor Stand Home Office Desk This computer desk brings a modern style for home. Designed for small rooms or limited spaces, its strong storage power can keep everything organized without any mess. 2 drawers and 2-tier shelves design could help you place your favorite books, decorations, or notes for easy access, which fits well in your home office, study room, bedroom, or living room.

Two Drawers Drawers are made of breathable high-quality fabric, lightweight while providing sufficient storage space. Monitor Stand Keeps your monitor at your sight level and effectively improves your sitting posture. Premium Sleek Desktop The desktop is waterproof, scratch-Resistant and heat-Resistant. An easy wipe will remove stains.

reviews.reviewerName: Better than expected Better than expected
reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fits like a dream
reviews.reviewText: I was looking for a small desk to fit in the small corner space I had in my room. It was very easy to assemble it took me like 45 min to an hour to do this myself, if you have someone to help it would be faster. I do appreciate that it comes with little legs attachments where you can tighten or loosen in case you desk is wobbly or tilting to make it sturdy. It fits both my work 24 inch work monitors comfortably and even extra space. My laptop fits perfectly under the ledge and a standard keyboard as well. It does come with 2 drawers that are fabric material and the front piece is that wood material, if you're picky you might not like it. I dont mind as they are nice and sturdy, I can fit a standard binder in there with plenty of room. Overall im happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: the instructions were very easy and it came out nice. one thing I a that all the holes lined up and had a tight fit. I still used thread lock to insure it won't loosen and wobble. But it's very solid

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars It is cute
reviews.reviewText: I really liked the color. Was easy to put together. Not too big on the cloth like drawers. A few months in and it’s pretty sturdy. Still looks brand new. Light weight.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent instructions and numbered bags with parts.
reviews.reviewText: This desk is decent quality for the price and what really made this easy to assemble was the numbered parts bags and the numbers referenced in the instructions on which bags of parts to use for each segment of the assembly. The desk went together very easily. Very sturdy and solid as a rock.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewText: It took me quite a while to pick out a desk to work from hone. I couldn't be happier with this desk. Super sturdy. Well made. Perfect set up for dual monitors. Easy clean surface and just looks super nice . Great product. Took a bit to set up, because I did it by myself. But 100 % satisfied. Sturdy drawers and shelf.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This desk is amazing, however it may be hard to do it by yourself there parts were you need someone to help you hold things. Other then that me and my dad finished this whole thing before the minion ride of gru movie ended. It is very cute and the drawers were very easy and I like the more then normal wood ones because wood ones add more weight which can break your desk. These drawers can fit a lot of things, the shelves you can adjust the heights however they aren’t that big you can fit about one notebooks and a half on it. If you want to have many things in your desk maybe they more drawers or shelves but this fit me perfectly. The instructions were very clear just be mindful of how you put things together and how they are facing because there are many holes and you may get confused and take even longer to build the desk. Overall good desk, easy to build but the storage may be tough depending on how many things you plan on putting on the desk.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great deal for the bedroom or office. Sturdy. And great look.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Nice desk, damaged board
reviews.reviewText: Based on the previous reviews I held my breath hoping the pieces wouldn’t be damaged. Unfortunately, one of the boards was damaged but the desk is nice overall.
